DOC.brief_title: ProSat - Long Term Effect Probiotics Satiety
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman Normal slight overweight ( BMI : 2228 kg/m2 ) 2045 year age Smoking Daily medicine use ( oral contraceptive exclude ) Use pre probiotic supplement food Blood donation 3 month prior study Hb < 7,5mmol/l Chronic illness hyperlipidemia , diabetes inflammatory disease Pregnancy breastfeed Elite athlete ( > 10 hour hard exercise/week ) Vegetarians
